Uses of Class
chat.common.AbstractContent

  • Packages that use AbstractContent 
    Package Description
    chat.client.algorithms.chat  
    chat.common  
    chat.server.algorithms.election  

    • Uses of AbstractContent in chat.client.algorithms.chat

      Subclasses of AbstractContent in chat.client.algorithms.chat 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChatMessageContent
      This class defines the content of a chat message.
      Methods in chat.client.algorithms.chat with parameters of type AbstractContent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Actions.receiveChatMessageContent(AbstractState state, AbstractContent content)
      treats the reception of a chat message: the message is displayed in the console.

    • Uses of AbstractContent in chat.common

      Methods in chat.common with parameters of type AbstractContent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Action.execute(AbstractState state, AbstractContent msg)
      executes the algorithmic part corresponding to this action.
      default void Action.executeOrIntercept(AbstractState state, AbstractContent msg)
      executes the action due to the receipt of the message msg or intercepts the call of the action for instance to eventually re-schedule the receipt of the message so that some non-determinism is introduced.
      static void Interceptor.intercept(AbstractState state, AbstractContent msg)
      intercepts the receipt of a message.

    • Uses of AbstractContent in chat.server.algorithms.election

      Subclasses of AbstractContent in chat.server.algorithms.election 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ElectionLeaderContent
      This class defines the content of a leader message of the election algorithm.
      class  ElectionTokenContent
      This class defines the content of a token message of the election algorithm.
      Methods in chat.server.algorithms.election with parameters of type AbstractContent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Actions.receiveLeaderContent(AbstractState state, AbstractContent content)
      treats a leader message of the election algorithm.
      static void Actions.receiveTokenContent(AbstractState state, AbstractContent content)
      treats a token message of the election algorithm.
